OSCemote has been tested with the following applications.

<b>NOTE:</b> For applications that support only MIDI, you will need to use a bridge to convert OSCemote's OSC messages to MIDI.  Here are tutorials on how to use <a href="http://">Max</a>, <a href="http://">PureData</a> or <a href="http://">OSCulator</a> to map OSC to MIDI.

Items highlighted in <em>italics</em> will probably work, but have not been tested by OCSemote's author.
